summary: Project 'Eye-R' with live canister deployment; user reports live deployment stuck and requests forced rebuild and redeploy with explicit build error reporting if it fails.
known_issues: Live canister deployment is stuck; needs forced rebuild and redeploy. If build fails, capture and report exact build error.

existing_features.title: Force a clean rebuild of the Eye-R project (frontend + backend) and redeploy the resulting build artifacts to the live canister (not draft).

new_feature_requests.summary: If the rebuild or redeploy fails, capture and present the exact build/deploy error output (verbatim) including the failing command, exit code, and the full compiler/toolchain error text so it can be used to diagnose and fix the issue.
